title: A proclamation to prevent abuses by the souldiers: by his excellencie Sir Thomas Fairfax, Knight, Commander in Chiefe of the forces raised by the Parliament.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
notes: Complaints are made of violent seizing of horses and quarter-money. No person is to take horses except by sufficient warrant, or demand quarter money, on pain of punishment by the Council of War, before which all offenders are to be brought -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
